alert.note: Alert for St Croix (Virgin Islands) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued October 09 at 10:15AM AST until October 09 at 5:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Maximum heat indices exceeding 112 degrees. * WHERE...Urban and coastal areas of northern Puerto Rico from Mayaguez to Fajardo and the interior valleys of eastern Puerto Rico, Culebra, Vieques and Saint Croix. * WHEN...Until 5 PM AST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Heat exhaustion or heat stroke likely with prolonged exposure.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Do not leave young children and pets in unattended vehicles. Car interiors will reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
